alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:43PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Albany and southern Laramie Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 643 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow wind from thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of North Cheyenne to 7 miles east of Crystal Lake Campground to 8 miles east of Virginia Dale. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, South Greeley, Hillsdale, Ranchettes, Warren AFB, Frontier Park, North Cheyenne, Warren Af Base, Fox Farm-College and South Greeley High. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 1 and 25. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 341 and 382. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
